query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select OWNER , JOB_NAME , ENABLED , trim(JOB_ACTION) JOB_ACTION --, PROGRAM_NAME --, PROGRAM_OWNER , to_char(LAST_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM Dy') LAST_START_DATE , LAST_RUN_DURATION , to_char(NEXT_RUN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM Dy') NEXT_RUN_DATE , REPEAT_INTERVAL , NUMBER_OF_ARGUMENTS , to_char(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM Dy') START_DATE , to_char(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM Dy') END_DATE , JOB_TYPE , JOB_CLASS , RUN_COUNT FROM SYS.ALL_SCHEDULER_JOBS where ( :JOB_NAME is null or upper(JOB_NAME) like upper(:JOB_NAME)) and owner not in ( 'ORACLE_OCM', 'EXFSYS' ) order by OWNER , JOB_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select INSTANCE_ID , LOG_ID , to_char(LOG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM DY') LOG_DATE --, OWNER --, JOB_NAME --, JOB_SUBNAME , STATUS , ERROR# , to_char(REQ_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM DY') REQ_START_DATE , to_char(ACTUAL_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM DY') ACTUAL_START_DATE , RUN_DURATION --, SESSION_ID --, SLAVE_PID , CPU_USED --, CREDENTIAL_OWNER --, CREDENTIAL_NAME --, DESTINATION_OWNER --, DESTINATION --, ADDITIONAL_INFO from SYS.all_scheduler_job_run_details where JOB_NAME = :JOB_NAME order by log_id desc

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) /* Scheduler Reports All Job Args */ select * from sys.all_scheduler_job_args a where a.JOB_NAME = :JOB_NAME and a.owner = :OWNER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select CASE WHEN ENABLED = 'TRUE' THEN 'begin dbms_scheduler.disable( '||''''||OWNER||'.'||JOB_NAME||''''||' ); end; /' WHEN ENABLED = 'FALSE' THEN 'begin dbms_scheduler.enable( '||''''||OWNER||'.'||JOB_NAME||''''||' ); end; /' END "ENABLE/DISABLE JOB" from SYS.ALL_SCHEDULER_JOBS where OWNER = :OWNER and JOB_NAME = :JOB_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'EXEC dbms_scheduler.enable( '||''''||OWNER||'.'||JOB_NAME||''''||' );' "ENABLE JOB" from SYS.ALL_SCHEDULER_JOBS where OWNER = :OWNER --and --JOB_NAME = :JOB_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'EXEC dbms_scheduler.disable( '||''''||OWNER||'.'||JOB_NAME||''''||' );' "DISABLE JOB" from SYS.ALL_SCHEDULER_JOBS where OWNER = :OWNER --and --JOB_NAME = :JOB_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'BEGIN '||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.disable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'job_action'||''''||', value => '||''''||:JOB_ACTION||''''||');' ||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'repeat_interval'||''''||', value => '||''''||'FREQ=YEARLY;BYYEARDAY=-205;BYHOUR=4;BYMINUTE=0;BYSECOND=0'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.enable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||' );'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'end;'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'BEGIN '||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.disable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'job_action'||''''||', value => '||''''||:JOB_ACTION||''''||');' ||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'repeat_interval'||''''||', value => '||''''||'FREQ=MONTHLY;BYMONTHDAY=15;BYHOUR=4;BYMINUTE=0;BYSECOND=0'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.enable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||' );'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'end;'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'BEGIN '||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.disable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'job_action'||''''||', value => '||''''||:JOB_ACTION||''''||');' ||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'repeat_interval'||''''||', value => '||''''||'FREQ=WEEKLY;BYDAY=SUN;BYHOUR=4;BYMINUTE=0;BYSECOND=0'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.enable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||' );'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'end;'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'BEGIN '||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.disable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'job_action'||''''||', value => '||''''||:JOB_ACTION||''''||');' ||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'repeat_interval'||''''||', value => '||''''||'FREQ=DAILY;BYHOUR=16;BYMINUTE=0;BYSECOND=0'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.enable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||' );'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'end;'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'BEGIN '||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.disable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'job_action'||''''||', value => '||''''||:JOB_ACTION||''''||');' ||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'repeat_interval'||''''||', value => '||''''||'FREQ=HOURLY;BYMINUTE=0'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.enable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||' );'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'end;'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'BEGIN '||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.disable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'job_action'||''''||', value => '||''''||:JOB_ACTION||''''||');' ||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'repeat_interval'||''''||', value => '||''''||'FREQ=MINUTELY;BYMINUTE=0,10,20,30,40,50;BYSECOND=0'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.enable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||' );'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'end;'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select 'BEGIN '||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.disable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'job_action'||''''||', value => '||''''||:JOB_ACTION||''''||');' ||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute_null( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''|| ', attribute => '||''''||'repeat_interval'||''''||');'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.set_attribute( name => '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||', attribute => '||''''||'start_date'||''''||', value => to_timestamp_tz('||''''||'2018-06-20 14:41:50 America/New_York'||''''||','||''''||'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS TZR'||''''||'));'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'sys.dbms_scheduler.enable( '||''''||'"'||:OWNER||'"."'||:JOB_NAME||'"'||''''||' );'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| 'end;'||chr(13)||chr(10)|| '/' from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('PROCOBJ', :JOB_NAME, :OWNER) from dual union select dbms_metadata.get_ddl('JOB', :JOB_NAME, :OWNER) from dual

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT owner , chain_name , rule_set_owner , rule_set_name , number_of_rules , number_of_steps , enabled , comments FROM dba_scheduler_chains order by owner , chain_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT owner , chain_name , rule_owner , rule_name , condition , action , comments FROM dba_scheduler_chain_rules where owner = :OWNER AND chain_name = :CHAIN_NAME ORDER BY owner , chain_name , rule_owner , rule_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT owner , chain_name , step_name , program_owner , program_name , step_type FROM dba_scheduler_chain_steps where owner = :OWNER AND chain_name = :CHAIN_NAME ORDER BY owner , chain_name , step_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT owner , job_name , chain_owner , chain_name , step_name , state FROM dba_scheduler_running_chains where owner = :OWNER AND chain_name = :CHAIN_NAME ORDER BY owner , job_name , chain_name , step_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT OWNER , JOB_CLASS_NAME , SERVICE , RESOURCE_CONSUMER_GROUP , LOGGING_LEVEL , LOG_HISTORY , COMMENTS FROM dba_scheduler_job_classes ORDER BY job_class_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) select OWNER , JOB_NAME , ENABLED , trim(JOB_ACTION) JOB_ACTION --, PROGRAM_NAME --, PROGRAM_OWNER , to_char(LAST_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM Dy') LAST_START_DATE , LAST_RUN_DURATION , to_char(NEXT_RUN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM Dy') NEXT_RUN_DATE , REPEAT_INTERVAL , NUMBER_OF_ARGUMENTS , to_char(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM Dy') START_DATE , to_char(END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM Dy') END_DATE , JOB_TYPE , JOB_CLASS , RUN_COUNT FROM SYS.ALL_SCHEDULER_JOBS where /* ( :JOB_NAME is null or upper(JOB_NAME) like upper(:JOB_NAME)) and owner not in ( 'ORACLE_OCM', 'EXFSYS' ) */ JOB_CLASS = :JOB_CLASS_NAME order by OWNER , JOB_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT OWNER , START_DATE , END_DATE , SCHEDULE_TYPE , SCHEDULE_NAME , REPEAT_INTERVAL , FILE_WATCHER_NAME , FILE_WATCHER_OWNER , EVENT_CONDITION , EVENT_QUEUE_AGENT , EVENT_QUEUE_NAME , EVENT_QUEUE_OWNER , COMMENTS FROM dba_scheduler_schedules ORDER BY owner , schedule_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT OWNER , WINDOW_NAME , WINDOW_PRIORITY , NEXT_START_DATE , LAST_START_DATE , ENABLED , ACTIVE , RESOURCE_PLAN , MANUAL_DURATION , MANUAL_OPEN_TIME , SCHEDULE_OWNER , SCHEDULE_NAME , SCHEDULE_TYPE , START_DATE , REPEAT_INTERVAL , END_DATE , DURATION , COMMENTS FROM dba_scheduler_windows ORDER BY window_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT WINDOW_GROUP_NAME , NEXT_START_DATE , ENABLED , NUMBER_OF_WINDOWS , COMMENTS FROM dba_scheduler_window_groups ORDER BY window_group_name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/12/06 (of last update/validation) SELECT window_group_name , window_name FROM dba_scheduler_wingroup_members where window_group_name = :WINDOW_GROUP_NAME ORDER BY window_group_name , window_name
